casebody.data:
Jarrod KAUFMAN, Rachel Kaufman, William Quick and Nancy Quick, on behalf of Themselves and All Others Similarly Situated, Plaintiffs,
v.
LUMBER LIQUIDATORS, INC. and Robert M. Lynch, Defendants-Respondents. M-870/871 September Term 2017
080001 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JUNE 15, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions of the Consumers League of New Jersey for leave to file an answering brief in opposition to the motion to strike as within time (M-871) and to appear as amicus curiae (M-870) are granted.
